suite.name: Ads

test.name: Deve cadastrar um anúncio com sucesso

kw.name: Begin Web Test
New Browser
kw.msg: {"browser": "chromium", "headless": true, "chromiumSandbox": false, "devtools": false, "handleSIGHUP": true, "handleSIGINT": true, "handleSIGTERM": true, "slowMo": 0.0, "timeout": 30000.0, "tracesDir": "/Users/keziamessias/Downloads/bikeboard-robot/robot/browser/traces/temp/4cd845d5-e187-41d1-b2e7-6f4a38bb82d7"}
kw.doc: Create a new playwright Browser with specified options.

kw.name: New Context
kw.doc: Create a new BrowserContext with specified options.

kw.name: New Page
kw.msg: Successfully initialized new page object and opened url: http://localhost:3000

kw.name: Get Title
kw.doc: Returns the title of the current page.
Navega para a página inicial e verifica o título.

kw.name: Ad Creation Mock
kw.msg: No keyword with name 'Ad Creation Mock' found.
kw.status: No keyword with name 'Ad Creation Mock' found.

kw.name: Click Advertise Link
kw.doc: Clica no link para anunciar e verifica se a página correta foi carregada.

kw.name: Fill Ad Form
kw.doc: Preenche o formulário de anúncio com os dados fornecidos.

kw.name: Submit Ad Form
kw.doc: Clica no botão para submeter o formulário de anúncio.

kw.name: Wait For Elements State
kw.doc: Waits for the element found by ``selector`` to satisfy state option.

kw.name: Wait For Elements State
kw.arg: text=Obrigado por escolher o BikeBoard para anunciar sua bicicleta
kw.doc: Waits for the element found by ``selector`` to satisfy state option.

kw.name: Wait For Elements State
kw.arg: text=Seu anúncio foi enviado para nossa equipe de moderação
kw.doc: Waits for the element found by ``selector`` to satisfy state option.

kw.name: End Web Test
Take Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current window or element and saves it to disk.

kw.name: Close Context
kw.msg: Switching context to CURRENT in CURRENT

kw.doc: Executado ao final de cada teste para tirar screenshot e salvar o vídeo.

test.status: No keyword with name 'Ad Creation Mock' found.

suite.doc: Suite de testes para cadastro de anúncios de bicicletas.
